titleStmt.title: A second letter from a gentleman in the country to his friends in London upon the subject of the penal laws and tests.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J.S. and T.S. and to be had of most booksellers in London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Penn by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
